name: Office Overtime
description: That soulless office job you hate? It hates you too, playing video games during work hours was your fault. Catch up on overdue work before morning. Coffee is your best friend.

name: Nixie
description: Nixie is a 2D story-driven exploration game about a robot's search for a missing human lost in an android space colony. Slash, fling, and glide your way through an eclectic world, while enjoying colorful 16-bit pixel art and an infectious soundtrack!

name: Super Jump Guys
description: "Super Jump Guys": Whimsical platformer inspired by "Only Up!" Ascend through quirky, stacked levels, mastering gravity-defying jumps while dodging hazards. How fast can you reach the summit and claim your name on the SJG Leaderboard's

name: Temple Knight Saga: Oath of the Knight's Sword
description: The story of the Three Temple Knights, dispatched on a secret mission, and takes place .Along the way, Sir Virginio accepted a request from a certain lady. But what truly awaits him. JRPG Quality. Translated with help from native English speaker, and not machine translation.

name: The Night of Erosion: Prequel
description: 'I', an ordinary high school student, turns into a monster every night after a certain incident. The protagonist struggles to find out why he became a monster and at the same time avoid being restrained. Please join this girl on her journey toward truth.

name: Titan Survival
description: Titan Survival is a survival roguelike where you pilot a powerful flying mech with the task of defending the last city on earth. Engage in fast paced aerial combat, use your enhanced reflexes to outmaneuver your enemies and create unique and powerful builds each time you play.

name: The Red Forest
description: Play as Yaro, an introverted young adult who's forced to explore the mysterious and bizarre Red Forest after his brother gets dragged into its depths by a sinister creature.

name: Unfated
description: An immersive post-apocalyptic MMO. Survive, resist and conquer in a world ravaged by ancient invaders. Form alliances, traverse diverse terrains, and reclaim humanity's destiny with Unreal Engine 5's breathtaking graphics and Chat GPT 4 natural language.

name: CrabMania
description: CrabMania is a competitive Party Game of between two and four simultaneous players.Each player controls a character, and must eliminate each other using a throwable object according each level.

name: Leisurely Brick
description: This is a leisurely brick game, the control of this game is to use the mouse to control the reflector to move for the reflection ball to attack the bricks, this game belongs to a casual game, the store in the game has a lot of strengthening content to improve the game experience

name: Syndicate of Souls
description: A tactical MOBA with a classic old-school feel and a few innovative twists. In "Syndicate of Souls", battle unfolds across three distinct maps. "Roadway To Ruin" is a 1v1 snowy bridge, providing tense duels. "Deserted Stronghold", a 3v3 map, places players amid swampy ruins, emphasizing team tactics. Lastly, "Dreamfall Grove", a 5v5 battleground, immerses players in a mystical forest with vibrant fauna, promoting expansive team strategies. Each map reflects the game`s emphasis on tactical gameplay, strategic positioning, and environmental interaction.

name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition
description: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition includes a physical copy of the game (on USB or Disc, PC release contains a bonus Steam key), a strategy guide, an 18"x24" reversible poster, a wearable replica tie, an "Plumber on a Bike" decal, a sticker sheet, 4x6 framed picture of the protagonist Jane and an 7" vinyl that contains the soundtrack of the game.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 3
description:
Julian Gerighty is returning to the Division brand he helped usher into the world. Gerighty has been appointed Executive Producer for The Division Brand, and will make the move once Star Wars Outlaws – a game he is currently overseeing as Creative Director - has shipped.

Gerighty is excited to return The Division. Before he joined Tom Clancy’s The Division team as Associate Creative Director in 2014, he remembers seeing the promise in its first reveal at E3 2013. “I remember the gameplay promise – the co-op, PvP, the open world RPG aspects. Its world seemed very relatable, and very realistic, like you could really be an agent for change within it.”

After joining the team at Massive Entertainment – A Ubisoft Studio and shipping the original in 2016, he moved to Tom Clancy’s The Division 2 as Creative Director, where he and his team crafted a new adventure in the summertime streets of Washington, D.C. Now, he’s setting his sights on Tom Clancy’s The Division 3, as well as the plethora of other projects set in The Division universe, including the mobile game Tom Clancy’s The Division Resurgence, and the survival-action shooter Tom Clancy’s The Division Heartland.

name: Skull Scavenger
description:
Skull Scavenger is an unforgiving twin-stick Extraction Looter Shooter where you are a soul trying to get out of hell.

Procedurally generated maps ensure you never escape from the same level twice!

name: Exoprimal: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Biggles On Mars
description: Grandson of the famous pilot, Biggles makes his living defending the planet of Mars with his rickety plane. Can he overcome a menacing scheme and also finally move into a new line of work?

name: Blastar
description:
Blastar was a game written by Elon Musk in 1984 (at the age of 12). The source code was published in a magazine and he received $500 for it. Ashlee Vance's Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX and the Quest for a Fantastic Future includes a reproduction of the page from the publication where it appeared. This version is based on that listing.
Elon has since moved beyond 8-bit spaceships.

"[It was] a trivial game... but better than Flappy Bird."
--Elon Musk

name: Nova
description:
Nova is essentially an RPG with horizontal Level Scaling, which means that any advantages players get over other players are temporary, with skill and game-knowledge being the primary determining factors in player success.

When a player logs into the game, they are presented with 5 points of interest: The Courtyard, the Kingdom, the Desert, the Forest, and the Dungeon. These locations' unique objectives and loot combined with their varying aesthetics and purposes give them each a unique personality.

There are 5 classes in Nova: Fire, Frost, Shadow, Nature, and Storm. Because of the bifurcated class structure and the unique synergies of the elements, there are essentially 10 fun and interesting classes. Each element entails 7 unique abilities that can be cast at any time with the only limitation being mana costs. This leads to 10 very different elemental combinations, all with access to unique Talents and Augments.

description: A cancelled port of Disney's The Haunted Mansion for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Brain Escape
description: You are an experimental brain ball that uses speed, agility and smarts to complete your mission…..all while being chased by a horde of hungry zombies.

name: Cardchery
description: Earn Gold by shooting increasingly harder targets in a 2D Archer Minigame. Spend your Gold in the Shop to buy Booster Packs and try to collect over +200 cards which all improve the abilities of you archer!

name: Cat Life Simulator
description: Cat Life Simulator is a realistic simulation game that allows you to see the world through the eyes of a cat. Explore the world, interact with the environment, and create your own cat's story. Your adventure begins in a domestic setting, but over time, you will discover many other places.

name: Abraca
description: Now is the time for justice! In this Roguelite game, players will be able to learn spells, strengthen skills, use the currency obtained from battles to purchase items from mysterious merchants, kill numerous demon claws, and ultimately conquer this world!

name: AloneGuy
description: AloneGuy is a 2D game in which you have to control the character on a small island, you can jump in four directions and if you make all your efforts, you can adjust to the rhythm of the game and jump over the pesky crabs in time.

name: Auxin
description: Swing your liana, plant and throw seeds in Auxin! Local and online multiplayer fun featuring intenses versus matches in 4 modes, for up to 4 players. Swing into action!

name: BattleSide
description: BattleSide is a 5,000 player MMOFPS persistent Land, Sea, Air, and Space war game where you and your buddies defend and capture control points to gather resources for your faction in battles of endless fun.

name: Deep Space Directive
description: Build. Expand. Upgrade. Defend. Combine TD and RTS mechanics to defend your growing economy.

name: Dreaming with You
description: Dreaming with You is an immersive third-person adventure set within the shared dream of Michael and Sarah. In this enigmatic dream, they find themselves kidnapped, forced to collaborate for their escape. The twist: as they work together, they might fall in love with eachother in a rom-com fashion.

name: Flow: Last Origins
description: Rip and combo through monsters to help Kioyu clear the Hunter’s Trials and uncover the source of his home settlement’s problems.

name: Cyber Rail
description: Jump, grapple, slide and swing your way through a flying convoy, fending off bandit gangs with a deadly arsenal of unique weapons and upgrades. Challenging, fast-paced parkour mechanics and unique gunplay deliver a roguelike experience unlike any other.

name: Coneru: Dimension Girl
description: Embark on a 2D action date with the dimension-girl, Coneru! This time, your date plan is to fend off the mysterious alien group "Hateful Fruit Company" invading Shinjuku City!

name: FrogLake
description: An RPG about a frog that has to save his lake from drying up. Explore the lake. Go where no frog has gone. Acquire magic water powers.

name: Glitched Lightning
description: A top-down 2D science fiction RPG battler with crafting and resource gathering.

name: Heavenstrafer
description: Heavenstrafer is a fast paced movement shooter with a gun combo system that rewards aggressiveness and experimentation. Explore the ruins of hell and destroy angels (and demons) across three chapters filled with small but challenging arenas.

name: Lighthouse
description: Light is your only weapon in this dark and hostile world. It will help you find your way, solve puzzles and protect you from monsters. Grab your torch and venture into this horrific universe!

name: Return or No Return
description: "Return or No Return" is a first-person horror survival game set in a mansion that traps travelers passing through the infamous shortcut- The Tenebris Tunnel. After a mysterious smoke sweeps through the car, your friends have disappeared, and you're trapped! You must save them to escape death.

name: Rulegement
description: Can you run a big business from scratch? What if you sink, can you come out again? Own a big business and turn every part of the city into money.

name: Solar Pall
description: It seems that nothing has changed in the quiet village of Vitalik's grandmother. It's time to have some fun and make new friends! But what if strange things await here at every step? Get ready to go on an adventure full of secrets and mysteries!

name: Samhain
description: Samhain is an investigative horror game that can be played solo or with up to four players online. Investigate brutal murder scenes and determine what creature was responsible. Next, gather tools and items to help you survive. At midnight, the monster returns.

name: Mikene's Aspects
description: Guide Mikene in the search for the 7 Aspects of Balance to achieve Omnipotence and put an end to the problem plaguing the city of Farzin once and for all. Dive into hordes of enemies in this frantic hack n' slash in the best Soulslike style!

name: Murder By Death
description: A narrative adventure set in 1930s England. Immerse yourself in an adventure where knowing who, how and why will depend on your skills as a detective.

name: Panda & Crow: A Paraglide Adventure
description: Panda & Crow is a fun Third-Person Arcade Game where you play a paragliding panda. Use thermals to stay in the air, stear clear of rainy clouds, and hurry from site to site and take a selfie before your tour bus leaves!

name: PushOver
description: Push your friends (or the computer) off the platforms in this chaotic 2D platform fighting game. With multiple gamemodes and even a single player mode you can push as much as your heart desires!

name: World of Reinvention
description: World of Reinvention is an adventure rpg for the ages set in a wonderous fantasy world briming with places to discover, creatures to encounter, and oh ever so much to learn. Who you will be is entirely up to you but be wary, the fate of this world is in your hands (probably).

name: Whisper: In the Dark
description: Embark on a vibrant 2D pixel odyssey as Whisper, an emissary of the darkness. Explore an atmospheric, nonlinear world with branching paths and hidden wonders. Engage in fast-paced combat and smooth platforming in this nostalgia-infused Metroidvania adventure.

name: School Fantasy
description: School Fantasy Is a single-player role-playing game, players can follow the main story to complete the quests, collect treasures; Or explore the world and trigger adventures; Or focus on developing romantic stories with different characters; Everything is up to you.

name: Gas Station Simulator: DLC Pack
description: With the Gas Station DLC Pack, restore a gas station, build an airstrip, perform dynamic renovations with a hammer, and ignite fun with a party venue, collectibles, and ice cream. Elevate your Gas Station Simulator experience!

name: Generative Quest
description: A captivating multiplayer dungeon crawler built with Unreal Engine 5. Journey through haunting procedurally-generated dungeons, unleash devastating abilities, and discover legendary items while playing with up to 7 of your friends. Become the ultimate hero in Generative Quest!

name: Five a Side Football 2024
description: The world’s fastest, most fun five-a-side management game is back! In Five A Side Football 2024 you can take control of comedy versions of your favourite team or cast your mind back to a time before the Premier League and take on a retro challenge. Whether you're chasing the league trophy with a team of superstars, attempting to turn a mid-table squad into champions, or saving a struggling bunch from relegation; the fate of your team and your job is in your hands!

name: Fine Artist Color Pixel Number
description:
Draw great pixel arts easily with numbers
Relax yourself with Fine Artist App!
Make some great drawings very easily, just select a model with a touch on the top middle button, and paint it very quickly. You pick up a colour at the bottom of the app, and you press on the corresponding number. Draw each number until all done and enjoy a very cool pixel art by yourself.
You share it to your friends by clicking on Share button only when you are satisfied of your work.

"Xavix Bowling" is software exclusively for Xavix Port released by SSD Co. in 2004. Xavix Port is a game machine that mainly releases sensory games, and with this software you can actually move your body and play virtual bowling using a dedicated bowling ball-shaped controller.
This work can be said to be the successor to "Excite Bowling" released in Japan, and the image quality has been improved due to the evolution of the Xavix chip.

name: Happy Dash
description:
Happy Dash is a funny endless platformer that has a lot to offer!
If you cherish a lovely pixel art style, mashed up with modern mobile features like achievements, leader boards and simple, intuitive touch controls, this might just be the game for you!
As you dash your way through random generated levels, you beat up tons of enemies, doing combos while gaining EXP to level up and make it to new worlds!
Each run is different from the last one, but you make a progress since you can visit the Upgrade Shop after each time!
So better catch a lot of coins, there's really cool stuff to spend it on!
There are a lot of achievements to obtain and global highscores to compete with your friends and other players around the world, but that's certainly not all! As you buy drafts for new types of blocks, unlock new power-ups and boost your character, eventually you'll unlock your super power!
So start collecting coins, destroying blocks, killing tons of enemies, go upgrade your stuff and find new and awesome power-ups!
Are you ready to dash your way through hours of fun gameplay?

name: Clover Cuby
description:
Tap to move and double tap to jump.
Catch Rainbow Clover to become Invincible to defeat Bad Caterpillar.
Compete and share with your friends!

name: Hot Dot!
description: It's gonna get hot...dot...dot...dot

name: Cookie Smash: Cookie Mania
description:
Cookie Smash Cookie Mania Cookie Match 3 Game 2016 is an all-new match 3 puzzle-adventure. Switch and match 3 or more cookie and cookies as many as you can to collect your yummy cookie .
Cookie Smash Cookie Mania Cookie Match 3 Game 2016 is an awesome match-3 puzzle game. Have crumble fun in Cookie Smash Cookie Mania!
Make matches of 3 or more cookies, create Cookie Smash Cookie Mania! Starts out simple, but things get more and more interesting and challenging.
Have fun with so sweet and delicious cookie casual game.

name: Hidden Object: Victoria & Steve Vikings Adventures
description:
Do you have a fur-coat? Victoria and Steve have dressed warmer, because now their next trip is to Greenland. Home of the ancient Vikings, who were brave and courageous. The Vikings have their own secret that Victoria with Steve have to unravel.
Take on the role of a talented archaeologist detective who always trust his/her intuition and intellect! A huge number of hidden objects, as well as bonus levels will not leave you indifferent. Collect all of the shield parts that will lead you to the mysterious medallion.

name: Fit the Shape!
description: When the last square reach the main square you better fit the shape.

name: Piggy Wiggy
description:
Help cute little piggies to get acorns by solving brain-busting puzzles!
Piggy Wiggy is a new cool physics-based puzzle game presented by Qaibo Games. Create links between various objects on the screen to help guide the pigs to the acorns in each level. Don't let the pigs touch the spikes!
What is interesting in the puzzle game?

name: Big Bad Sudoku Book
description: If you like Sudoku you have to try Big Bad Sudoku Book. It's our opinion that many other versions of the game sort of take the fun out of it. They won't let you enter in wrong numbers, and if you ask for a hint they straight up give you the answer to a cell. Why not just put up a puzzle and solve it for you? I'll tell you why, cause that's not fun! Our approach is a lot different. Our hints guide you to answers without flat out giving it away. We provide the tools you need to solve the puzzle with your brain, just like a real paper sudoku book but better!

name: Tiny Step
description: Join in a new awesome game by helping these adorable and mysterious creatures progress through a furry labyrinth and reach their respective portals. Dive into a breathtaking gameplay experience that you might find not just stimulating but also quite relaxing.

name: IlinkWord Play
description: Connect letters to make up words.

name: Rock UFO
description: In the dark infinite space, There is a staggering UFO without anyone controlling! The front is full of danger, and you are the only one who can save it!

name: Sunpolis
description:
The mysterious city of Sunpolis opens its gates for the first time...
You, the Glorious Bird, will guide the sun in its quest to bring back the light in this enigmatic city.Will you be agile enough to overcome the obstacles as you pursue your infinite journey?
Drift away, and be inspired by the meditative mood of Sunpolis!

name: Marshawn Lynch Blocky Football
description: Tear up the football field as you run, tackle and smash through the defense, with lots of fun and humor.

name: Dodge & Roll
description: The winter has come, and our little Snowball has woken up in a wonderful land of snow! He doesn't know who he is, he doesn't know where he is, but he is trying really hard to find out.

name: Hazumino
description: Run, jump and build your way to new worlds and high scores in Hazumino, the game that combines relentless endless-runner with tricky block puzzle gameplay! Compete against your friends and become a Hazumino master!

name: Animal Wrestler
description: In Animal Wrestler, you can pit hamsters against bears and rabbits against turtles!

name: Luna League Soccer
description:
Luna League Soccer is an over-the-top soccer/football game that takes inspiration from old arcade classics. This game follows the basic rules of Soccer, but adds crazy power ups and magic attacks to the mix.
Luna League Soccer is a challenging arcade game that takes you to a galaxy far, far away. You play as one of six rivalling factions that are fighting for world domination using the game of soccer as a means to overcome political stand-offs and military conflict.

name: Bull Chase!
description:
Play now the best bull chasing game in the store!
Bull Chase! offers hours of gameplay ready to be played - check it out and let us know what you think!

name: Tales of Arise: Deluxe Sound Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirates!
description: Swap and match gems on your journey with pirates through unknown lands and seas in this addictive and exciting match-3 game. Dig treasures, open chests, fight enemies or fulfil other tasks you are given in each level. Combine gems to create mighty ones and then combine these new gems to create even more powerful ones!

name: Longest River
description:
Are you looking for a new water flow logical puzzle?
Do you want this path puzzle to be challenging and relaxing at the same time?
Play Longest River, a new flow water maze puzzle in which you need to create the longest river paths using blocks of stones all while enjoying the peaceful sounds of nature and piano.

name: Devil's Mansion
description: "Devil's Mansion" is a game designed and produced by the Taiwan R&D team, which will take you into a fantasy haunted house full of relaxation and fun. Here, you will no longer be just an ordinary devil, but the "devil who doesn't want to be a devil but opens a haunted house to make a living" who decided to open a haunted house to attract tourists!

name: Starship Danger!
description: "Starship Danger!" offers a straightforward and captivating space adventure. Take control of your starship and face a continuous loop of cosmic trials. Your mission: Survive as long as you can against asteroids, space debris, and enemy ships.

name: AFK Football
description: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of AFK Football, a unique fusion of soccer strategy and RPG! Engage in intense competition with players from around the world, master strategic combos, and explore the intriguing backstories of each of our uniquely designed stars. AFK Football isn't just another sports game—it's an epic journey in the quest for world football domination!

name: Drumblox
description:
Drumblox music rhythm game is an innovative, unique and fun drum rhythm game where you learn how to play drums to original music in different genres.
Your goal is to hit the beat - small cubes - as they are coming at your drum pads.
In this game you are the drummer. You play the drums - for real!
This music game develops your rhythmical sense and gives you a better understanding of how the different rhythm patterns affects the music.
New original music & levels added each week. Join the music drum rhythm game revolution!

name: StarLight
description:
StarLight is an absolutely addictive game! You never wanna miss it!
You will be a lonely star, looking for the light from other stars in the universe.

name: Ghostwire: Tokyo 2
description: An upcoming sequel to Ghostwire: Tokyo. The game was leaked in court documents relating to the FTC v. Microsoft court case.

name: Dishonored 3
description: Dishonored 3 is the upcoming third entry in the Dishonored series. The title was leaked in court documents relating to the FTC v. Microsoft case.

name: Fallout 3: Remaster
description: In court documents for the FTC v. Microsoft court case, a remaster for Fallout 3 was leaked in an upcoming list of games from Bethesda.

name: The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion Remaster
description: An upcoming remaster for The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion was leaked in documents relating to the FTC v. Microsoft court case.

name: Doom Year Zero
description: Doom Year Zero is an upcoming game in the Doom series developed by Bethesda. The title was leaked in a document used in the FTC v. Microsoft court case, which showcased upcoming titles from Microsoft.

name: The Journey Home
description: The Journey Home is a cinematic and meditative platformer adventure set in a surreal world where you travel beyond the boundaries of time and space. Make your way through stunning and mysterious settings, solve surreal puzzles, and find answers to the life-long questions that haunt Walter.

name: BraceUp VR
description: BraceUp VR is a ultimate Play & Train game! Engage in thrilling break activities fused with home fitness. Master modes, boost stamina, conquer environments, and dominate in multiplayer battles. Become a Hero, tailor your challenge. Experience fun, competition, and immersion in this VR game!

name: Airport Renovator Simulator
description: "Airport Renovator Simulator" is a game that allows you to engage in airport reconstruction! In this captivating game, you have the opportunity to transform an old, outdated airport into a modern and functional air transportation hub and begin serving thousands of people every day.

name: Dragon Tower
description: Dragon Tower is a light rogue game set in a different world, where players take on the role of a brave adventurer exploring inside the Dragon Tower. They will assemble their own team to create unique strategies and defeat the monsters within the Dragon Tower.

name: Echoes From The Threshold 2
description: Welcome to the Threshold, a place where reality is altered, and memories become disturbing, dark reflections of what once was. Find items to help escape, and explore an almost fully interactive environment!

name: PsychoDive
description: You play as Lennox, a psychic who ends up in prison for a good deed gone bad. A detective and a psychologist offer him freedom in exchange for help using his abilities. But what starts as yet another good deed quickly devolves into true psychological horror.

name: Fly Guys
description: Fly Guys is a third person, open world flying game. Play as a little owl guy named Fly Guy or Fly Gal and relax in this calming atmosphere surrounded by nature. Fly around to discover new locations and explore the map, searching for eggs to rescue them all. Take on challenges and explore!

name: Odd Infinitum: First Contact
description: Arm yourself with a variety of tactical weapons and take to the cosmos in a boss-rush shoot-em-up inspired by SNES shooters. You are a pilot fresh from the academy, thrust into a battle to defend humanity from the darkest abominations of the Infinitum. What lurks among the stars has a plan for you…

name: Midnight Blood Rush
description: In this fast-paced rogue-lite, your health points are your only resource: sacrifice them to acquire vampiric powers and devour your enemies to heal yourself! Beware: every drop of blood counts in this frantic race to defeat the apostles of the Cult of the Sun!

name: Domestic Revolt
description: As a genius inventor from the Roaring Twenties, immerse yourself in a unique VR adventure, battling hordes of revolting household robots with your special skills and melee weapon. Upgrade your skills in real time and survive the "new industrial revolution"!

description: This 5-minute VR puzzle experience multiplies your 2x2 meter tracking space several times over. We take a human being test subject (You) through a wondrous test environment using the power of Redirection. It is probable your mind will be blown open like a cantaloupe (metaphorically).

name: Airport Contraband Police
description: Airport Contraband Police is a game that allows you to step onto the front lines of the battle against illegal contraband trafficking at an international airport. As a police, you're responsible for ensuring security and preventing the smuggling of illegal goods and materials across the border.

name: Viking Survival
description: Embark on an epic Viking saga, standing as the last line of defense against marauding orcs. Guide your hero through wild storms, wielding a magical axe to safeguard your tribe and territory. Uncover hidden treasures within ancient chests and crates, fortifying your journey with vital resources.

name: Badventure
description: Badventure is a kooky player-directed RPG, like DnD but tastier and more unhealthy. One player will become the dungeon master, creating rooms with obstacles, enemies, and traps. The rest of the players band together as a party of adventurers to overcome the challenges set for them. Huzzah!
