name: Dawnshard
description:
Dawnshard is a multiplayer fantasy card game for pc and mobile devices. Focused on eSport and competition.

Dawnshard is the first digital card game that integrates procedural generation in deck building, with the intention of removing the meta-game.

Playing Dawnshard feels like exploring a Jungle. In the Jungle, you have the tools you have.

You can’t just look up what the best strategies are. You'll have to adapt during each game to your opponent's strategies!

name: Lugh World
description: A cozy MMORPG that mixes adventure, creature capture and farming.

name: Asurajang
description: Asurajang is a new Battle Royale experience that mixes in melee combat that packs a punch and trendy anime style graphics. Pick your favorite character and engage in strategic combat to become the last team standing in Asurajang.

name: Forbidden Story
description: Walk around the rooms, check the cabinets in detail, collect the pieces of paper and try to escape from this mysterious house!

name: Neko: Insufficient FirePower
description: Neko Insufficient Firepower is a meat pigeon 2D tablet shooting game, a cat-themed game made in a hand-drawn comic style. Quickly defeat the enemies with the cute cat!

name: Cronie the Assassin's Mission: The Teddy Bear Payment
description: What happens when a proficient assassin enters a thieves stronghold directly? Use skills to backstab enemies from behind, or fight head-on. Will Cronie be able to successfully complete the commission?

name: Photophore: Chapter 1
description: An arcade game that oscillates between shooting, brick-breaking and reflection.

name: With Last Breath
description: Survive the post-apocalyptic world in this intense top-down shooter. Battle zombies and soldiers, manage stats, loot gear, solve puzzles, and face challenging boss fights. Adapt, scavenge, and conquer in this relentless action-packed game.

name: Craft Carnage
description: Craft Carnage is where survival meets strategy, where chaos meets creativity. How will you navigate this relentless realm? Will you emerge as a lone wolf, a skilled trader, or a leader of a thriving community? The choices are yours to make, and the consequences are yours to face.

name: HeroBot!
description: "HeroBot!" Is a 2d platformer inspired by Kirby and MegaMan. You play as HeroBot a robot that can grab and absorb your enemies and use their powers against them. You can also absorb two powers and mix them together for a stronger power. Absorb and mix powers to adapt to any situation!

name: Cryptid Hunter
description: Cryptid Hunter is a 1st-person single player horror game where you gather clues using a myriad equipment and traps. You need to identify the cryptid itself, determine what kind of bait to use for the trap, and which trap. Fail to provide the right trap and bait, and you end up being both.

name: Shadowstalk
description: Shadowstalk is a multiplayer stealth game where you play as a hero, or a traitor possessed by an evil spirit, you should escape from various places that are haunted by supernatural dangers using your abilities and items wisely and watch out for the traitor before they kill you.

name: No Numbers
description: Put two and two together in this minimalist, hex-based puzzle game that will rekindle your love for numbers. Solve thoughtfully crafted levels that invite you to engage your mind and explore the unique gameplay at your own pace.

name: Mobius
description: Mobius is a 5v5 First-Person Melee game being developed with Unreal Engine 5. Its core pillars include a high-skill ceiling, competitive gameplay, and user-created content.

name: Cozy Hike
description: Dive into the serenity of Cozy Hike and discover the secrets nature has kept hidden for generations. Start your adventure today and let the wilderness whisper its stories to you.

name: Rough Souls
description: A game with a new game style: Rough-Like

name: Curator
description: Curator is a management game whose goal is to build and manage your own museum. Several hundred real or fictitious works as well as many objects are made available to the player to allow him to create galleries unimaginable before.

name: The Last Kingdom
description: Embark on an epic journey in our immersive Viking survival game, where untamed lands await your exploration. Roam through a sprawling open world, navigating lush forests. As you brave the elements and carve out your path, your survival instincts will be put to the test.

name: Navigavia: Kirka's Island
description: Embark on an epic journey in Navigavia: Kirka's Island, a thrilling third-person action-adventure game. Unleash your inner hero against terrifying creatures.

name: Seek & Snipe
description: Step into the shoes of a sniper and take on challenging missions. Locate and eliminate targets using your keen perception and precision skills. Become a legend!

name: BloodSworn
description: Bloodsworn is a fast-paced, FPS roguelite game set in a blood-soaked, dark dimension. As a fugitive member of a cruel and twisted cult, you must take revenge on them alone or with the help of your friends. Whether you choose blood magic, guns or melee weapons, your path will be lined with blood.

name: House 2
description:
As a terrible storm approaches, two young girls spend a fateful night watching TV and playing games…

House 2 is the sequel to the hit indie horror game, House. In House 2, you play as Tabby & Melody, finally free from their cursed home, in the next chapter of the House saga.

name: Bombabomb!
description: Bombabomb! is a by old pre-installed games inspired game, where you light the bombs with matching neighbors to detonate them. The game is only complete when all the bombs have been detonated! When you say you can remove all the bombs easily, walk the talk!

name: Don't Go
description: An imagination fueled adventure. With a boy lost in a familiar world. Help him and his friend Orbie traverse a small but large world. While defending against any unfriendly creatures they might come across! Run, jump and shoot your way through the unknown. To find the truth for them both.

name: Hard Days
description: The confinement has started, Loren (or whatever name you decide), a happily married and dangerously horny woman, is going through a difficult time in her sex life, and being locked up all day at home increases her sexual appetite.

name: All one click
description: Prove yourself against thousands of enemies in seemingly endless waves. Upgrade your skills from fighting with an ordinary bow up to casting powerful magic spells. "All one click" is an Action-RPG that reduces player input to the most existing part of every RPG: the level-up.

name: The Nights on Arcade
description: In The Nights on Arcade, Axel searches for his sister in the spooky Arcade World. Face your fears and reveal dark secrets in this nightmare.

name: Civilization Simulator
description: "Civilization Simulator": A casual simulation game that lets you control the fate of civilizations. Every click will impact the course of civilization. Whether it's prosperous trade or unexpected disasters, each turn presents a brand new challenge!

name: Trapped in a Cage
description: Trapped in a Cage is a text adventure game developed by Disposable Club, where players will witness various events beyond human rationality that occur in an anti utopian prison. This is a small incision in a turbulent world, and also a brief moment of endless human nature.

name: Effugium
description: Effugium is a horror / puzzle game consisting of multiple sagas that each have a different goal and add extra mechanics. Find items, solve puzzles and change the direction of gravity while teleporting a monster to a random location as your only means of defense.

name: The Cult
description: In the shadowed year of 1985, a killer has been at large leaving behind trails of clues and grisly scenes. Two years have passed, yet the enigma of Ophelia's disappearance still remains. Ophelia vanished without a trace, leaving behind an unsettling scene.

name: Parking Lot Simulator
description: Are you ready to build your own parking empire? You'll start your career as a valet and then embark on a journey to build your own parking lot. Park, develop your area, and construct a life filled with wealth and enjoyment!

name: Mukke
description: Mukke City is about to take its musical turn! Help the new music scene by getting your self-created music on the radio, rocking the local music venues and hanging out with your newfound friends! MUKKE lets you make your own way between laid-back everyday life and gripping intrigue!

name: Days of Haze
description: Days of Haze is a puzzle filled climate simulated action RPG where your actions affect the weather and temperature. Coated in the exakt NES palette. it's insides reveal a deep survival lite action RPG

name: UNC: Pathfinder
description: UNC: Pathfinder will take you on a journey of psychological horror and personal acceptance. The first of a six game / six ARG series that will test the boundaries of game play and ethics. Fly spaceships, find real-life treasure chests, cry like a baby. Let's do this!

name: Under Siege
description: This is your realm, and its fate lies in your hands. Each decision you make shapes the story and the world around you. Stand strong, strategize wisely, and defend your castle from the siege.

name: Slimedrop Laboratory
description: It’s war under your microscope: bacteria will devour your Slime cells if you don't help! In this casual strategy game grow your cell sample, guide them to stay out of bacteria’s reach, boost your cells power, and watch them use unique abilities for survival.

name: Telegraphist 1920: Beats of War
description: A narrative rhythm game that takes you back to 1920. See, hear and feel the Battle of Warsaw from a novel perspective - a war telegraphist, the crucial bond between soldiers and commanders.

name: Zra Stories
description: Zra Stories is a story-driven exploration game that combines adventure with crime story elements. Play a young nature caretaker – a sorceress who has the ability to control natural phenomena. Upon arrival at the island of Zra, a routine order turns into a full-fledged investigation.

name: NightShift
description: A story driven, anime-inspired drifting game with racing and action mechanics that feel ripped from the pages of a manga.

name: Monotonia
description: In Monotonia, you take on the role of a worker with a simple mission: press a button to dodge resistances and generate as much energy as possible, without succumbing to resource scarcity, exhaustion, or insanity. How far will you be able to go?

name: Nectar
description: Use nectar to restore the world and its natural beauty. Traverse a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape and bring vibrant color to the environment. Solve puzzles, grow platforms, and explore a forgotten world.

name: Zombactory
description: Build factories and conveyor belts to make walls to defend against zombies as Alex and his crew try to save the neighborhood!

name: The Swarm
description: You can't run, you can't fight. The Swarm is coming. use your wits and your environment to try and survive The Swarm in this turn based twist on the block pushing genre.

name: Bounce Physics
description: Build with an array of physics bending tools to solve puzzles, or create and share your own!

name: Back to Reality
description: Oh no, this poor boy is trapped in a mobile game ad. Unfortunately, he's also completely incompetent. So please help him not to die. And to earn a living. Sounds awesome, right? Right? Now who is actually trapped here? Him or you?!

name: Feng Shen Bang 2023
description: This game takes Nezha, Xiaolongnv, Yang Jian and Jiang Ziya as the protagonists. The game tells the legendary story of the protagonists going to various places to adventure, and finally to Zhaoge City to destroy the three demons and defeat King Zhou.

name: Kinky Fight Club 2
description: Join the Kinky Fight Club, where sex is a competitive sport! Set the rules, customize your appereance, abilities and skills and get ready for intense matches to wrestle and seduce your way to the top and become the champion!

name: StarBoost
description: Test your skill and reaction speed in this action-packed sci-fi racer with breathtaking scenery. Boost, strafe, survive! Race alone or against opponents and unlock racers, power-ups, and new tracks through high scores.

name: Fish Survivor: Feed, Grow and Evolve!
description: Dive into an epic underwater world in "Fish Survivor," where you'll start as a small fish and embark on an exciting survival journey. Hunt, feed and grow into super-sized sea creatures as you explore an amazing underwater playground, all while evolving and gaining new abilities along the way.

name: Frieseria: The Grand Reopening
description: WE ARE OPEN! Frieseria is a wacky, fast-paced restaurant management game where you serve fries and chaos! You play as an employee with the objective of (dis)satisfying guests.

name: AploVVare Collection:18+ DLC
description: Legends say that there's some... "hidden content"... inside of some of the cartridges. Apparently you can dig them out by using a Game Succubus. Interested?

name: Lucia and the Possessed World
description: The Latina fighting Satina in Hell! Blast your way through demons to save your famiily!

name: The Logbook, A Submarine Adventure
description: Adventure and submarine exploration game. Control your Bathyscaphe with the help of a logbook. Through the game puzzles, bullet-hell sequences, and skill-based challenges, you will be plunged miles and miles into the depths where the ocean seems to have no bottom.

name: Merging City
description: In this chill strategic puzzle city building game, you get to choose when to place land and buildings such as houses, shops and factories, with no RNG. Expand your city by getting points through placing buildings to their desired location or merge the same buildings to upgrade to bigger buildings

name: Foxcrate
description: In this casual delivery roguelite game, you are the newest employee of Foxcrate, and must deliver all the packages on time, with an increasing number of packages and extra difficulties added each day.

name: Shards of the Past
description: A trading trip with a nearby village turns into an epic adventure when you discover a hidden truth about your world. You will meet new friends and foes, explore amazing places, and face a choice that will shape the future. Your actions and choices will determine the outcome of this story.

name: Basilisk
description: Shmup. Unlock. Customise. Experiment. Upgrade. Basilisk. Petrify. Easy.

name: Battle of Rebels
description: Fight off waves of zombies in this a single-player or multiplayer cross platform first- and third-person shooter game. Battle of Rebels Winner of the Unreal Florida Game Competition

name: Spellbound Shuffle
description: Tactical roguelike deckbuilding game in a funky post apocalyptic far west. Pick a hero, build your own deck and cleanse the world from the evil. On top of regular attacks and defenses, make good use of movement and positioning on the grid to stay alive !

name: Dark Killing
description: We venture into forbidden lands in pursuit of wealth, plundering the treasures of tomb, defeating evil creatures, and even eliminating fellow adventurers who dare to enter this place, looting them entirely. Then, before darkness completely engulfs us, we seek hidden portals to escape,

name: Push
description: This adventure puzzle RPG game revolves around box-pushing as its primary gameplay mechanic. Encounter mysterious mechanisms and puzzles, necessitating careful observation of surroundings and the use of clues for solution. Showcase intelligence and courage to escape this perilous place!

name: Uebernatural: The Video Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ms. Pac-Man Plus
description: Ms. Pac-Man must eat all the dots in a maze in order to advance to the next stage. She is chased by killer ghosts but she can eat them while powered-up after eating one of four large dots. Bonus points are awarded for eating the fruits and snacks that appear and wander the maze.

name: Lifeless Horizon
description: In this intense and thrilling zombie survival game, players must use their wits and quick reflexes to stay alive in a world overrun by the undead. With limited resources and endless hordes of zombies, players must scavenge for supplies, build their defenses, and work together with other survivors to stay alive. But beware, as danger lurks around every corner and any misstep can mean certain death. Will you be able to survive the zombie apocalypse?

name: Payday 3: Silver Edition
description: Payday3 is the much anticipated sequel to one of the most popular co-op shooters ever. Since its release, Payday-players have been reveling in the thrill of a perfectly planned and executed heist. That's what makes Payday a high-octane, co-op FPS experience without equal.

name: Final Justice
description: Japanese indie beat'em up for PC.

name: Koma
description: Koma, or Beigoma, are a kind of traditional Japanese wooden spinning top. In this game, you play as one in the odd situation of having to collect exclamation marks while trying to stay to moving platforms above an endless black void. Each stage has a different set of platforms, and though they move in the same patterns every time, the exclamation marks appear in random positions.

name: Hard Brain
description: Cyberpunk-themed turn-based strategy game.

name: Arena
description:
"Arena" is a game developed by Tom Madens for the "Net Yaroze", a PlayStation development kit and manufactured by Sony Computer Entertainment as a promotion to computer programming hobbyists.

It was featured on Official UK PlayStation Magazine's demo disc #108.

name: BS Super Aleste
description: Sin descripción

name: Kokoro no Pro
description: A pro wrestling-themed visual novel!

name: Coolson’s Chocolate Alphabet
description:
It was a rainy day when you finally found a job packing chocolates at Coolson’s factory. The days are all rainy around here. But it’s a tough job market for an English major, and you take what you get. So it’s piece work for the immediate future.
Each of those perfect little boxes, just waiting to be filled with shiny letter-embossed chocolates; it’s a pity to just toss them in without any thought. Wouldn’t it be better, wouldn’t it be beautiful, if all the boxes spelled out words? Careful, though. It wouldn’t do to get yourself fired by wasting time, or by wasting chocolate. You’ve got to be quick. You’ve got to be clever. You’ve got to play the game.

name: Stretch Text: Find Proverb
description: Embark on a word adventure like no other! 'Stretch Text: Find Proverb' challenges your perception and word skills in a captivating twist on word puzzles. In this unique game, words are stretched and concealed, waiting for your keen eye to reveal their secrets.

name: Word Spell Game: Yes or No ?
description:
"Word Spell Game: Yes or No? – Experience the Ultimate Word-Spelling Challenge! Welcome to a world where precision meets speed in our dynamic Spelling Adventure game. Explore two thrilling modes: Category Mode and Survival Mode.
Category Mode: Dive into a variety of word categories, from animals to technology. Test your word wisdom and showcase your spelling mastery. Each round presents a new challenge, keeping your mind engaged and vocabulary enriched.
Survival Mode: Brace yourself for an adrenaline-packed test of your spelling skills. With only 10 seconds on the clock, you must swiftly decide whether the word is spelled correctly or not. The challenge intensifies with every correct answer, pushing your limits in this battle of wits.

name: Dunk The Hoops: Bouncy Ball
description: With simple one tap gameplay which is easy to learn but hard to master. Bounce around and try to slam dunk as many hoops as you can.

name: Waddle Wars: Roguelike Defense
description: Get ready for a cozy adventure in "Waddle Wars" by Cozy Labs! Play as the hero penguin in a unique blend of tower defense and roguelike gameplay as you defend your castle from waves of cute yet pesky invaders. But that's not all - after each wave, select from 30+ different perks to upgrade your defenses. Summon guards, upgrade your castle, level up your hero, and more. Complete quests to unlock new hero skins and compete for bragging rights on the local and multiplayer high score tables.

name: Past Memories
description: The game tells the story of a woman who has to face all the important memories of her life by going though several distorted stages full of enemies, which symbolize the fragments of her past that have come back to haunt her. Our heroine must try to survive those nightmarish worlds by evading the enemies chasing after her and overcoming all the obstacles that stand in her way. She cannot fight back, she can only flee. But with the clever handling of dimension changing, and the several resources she is provided with, she can hold the monsters back and get to the end safe.

name: My Type!
description:
How fast can you type?
In "My Type!" your typing skills are put to the ultimate test. Write words to remove them before they fill up the board. Some words like "Explode" might have special effects, giving you an extra tool to bring you out of a tricky situation.
"My type" is the perfect game to improve your typing skills and learn how to text faster in a fun and engaging way. It's available in multiple languages to help as many people as possible have fun and improve.

name: Sticklings Deluxe
description:
Sticklings Deluxe is a unique puzzle game with the mission to lead a herd of Stickmen into their goals by using various abilities. Like a lemming, a Stickling just walks and walks and it is your objective to correctly assign the correct task to a Stickling to lead all the others the correct path. Abilities include blocking, self destruction, jump, bomb throwing, rush and bridge building. Try to earn as much gold, silver and bronze medals as possible. Oh, and by the way, if you fail there is always the option to nuke them!
More than 40 awesome handcrafted levels are waiting for you in this arcade puzzle game

name: Gunbrella: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last Librarian
description: Fight tons of robots, upgrade your abilities and explore an abandoned artificial planet with your jetpack in this non-linear shoot'em up adventure! Play as Gabriela Xanchez, a galactic government agent sent to investigate a dying world and find the last paper book in the galaxy.

name: Saga
description: Help Saga in her quest for revenge. A Viking girl who has lost everything to evil will embark on an epic journey to find answers and put an end to the hordes of enemies ravaging her land.

name: Frog And Roll
description: You have been turned into a frog by a druid. Roll around in this stylized platform game as a frog!

name: Altiverse
description: As one of the remaining survivors of the collapse, take your final stand and rebel against the AI and their creations who control, manipulate, and rule the Altiverse, before it’s too late...

name: Swordplay: Karakuri - Strange Tale
description: "Swordplay～Karakuri～Strange Tale" is a Japanese-style 3D action game set in a world where advanced "karakuri" technology is prevalent. Players can enjoy a slapstick drama in a world inspired by both "karakuri" mechanisms and the late Edo period.

name: Hypogean Descent
description: A first Person Lovecraftian Survival Horror game, inspired by the work of HP Lovecraft. Explore uncharted subterranean territory, document your findings and survive the horrors that you uncover.

name: Xanthaphobia
description: Xanthaphobia presents an immersive experience that blends elements of puzzles, mystery, and horror.

name: Echoes of Etheria
description: A Text-Adventure/Metroidvania set in a post apocalyptic city shrouded by an endless storm. Features turn-based combat, character leveling, weapon upgrades, and more! Explore the ruined city of Etheria, fight back against its deadly inhabitants, and find a way to put an end to the storm!

name: Seed In
description: Seed in is a vibrant, 2D, puzzle game that challenges you to dig your way out of ingenious and fun levels! Along the way, you’ll enjoy a relaxing, adorable, and quirky story with memorable and lovable characters!

name: New Ganymede
description: New Ganymede: an upcoming free-to-play open world indie sci-fi fantasy MMOARPG extravaganza where you can run, glide, shoot, slash, dash, roll and generally panic your way through co-op PVE with friends in a beautiful narrative driven world developed by an Australia-based team.

name: Liberators' Chronicles
description: Liberators' Chronicles is an exciting turn-based strategy game that will take you to the South American independence campaigns. Liberate an entire continent from the yoke of the Spanish crown as you command brave revolutionary leaders and their armies.

name: Assemble
description: Assemble is a creative sandbox VR game. Build anything and everything. Glue, snap, and pivot to make things that function like in real life. Share your creations with your friends. Easily bring your imagination to life.

name: Short Night
description: In Short Night:The Half Pint Lady choose between four horny goblin coworkers while keeping The Half Pint Lady from falling into disrepair. Complete unique quests, find hidden items, explore each goblin’s unique personality during the day and tackle increasingly difficult mini-games at night.

name: Spring Hell
description: Just Press Spacebar at the right time! It’s very simple arcade game with tiny puzzle and platformer.

name: ShelfLife: Art School Detective
description: ShelfLife: Art School Detective is a Mystery Adventure featuring a cast of loveable weirdos! Befriend and investigate 7 potential suspects. Use psychic powers to astral project into their artwork and learn their secrets. Unmask the mysterious ART KILLER that’s terrorising your campus!

name: Restricted Area
description: This game is a large team shooting game. The game supports the first person and the third person. In the future, intelligent robots generate autonomy in the process of self-iteration, and they decide to overthrow human domination. The player will play the role of a human soldier defeating a robot.

name: Elysium
description: Embark on an adventure that brings you to a mysterious island where lies the ruins of an ancient civilization. Build, fight, survive and discover how a newly discovered element on the island that gave Elythians a technological advantage also destroyed them.

name: Kanji Kitchen: Learn Japanese
description: Welcome to Kanji Kitchen! A unique fusion of cooking and language learning. From mochi-making to mastering Hiragana, Katakana, 2000+ Kanji, and the most essential words, your kitchen is your classroom.

name: Hero's Delirium
description: Hero's Delirium is a co-op medieval fantasy RPG. Where you or three other players play through a campaign, or explore the open world. In this adventure, you will save the world from the mind controlling tyranny.

name: Run 'n Gun: Deluxe
description: Welcome to a world that is full of danger, and your task is to destroy all enemies on your way in the original Run and Gun style!

name: Grim Prix
description: Grim Prix is a multiplayer vertical race where paladins compete from point A to point B in a given racing track in a frenetic melee combat against other players and enemies (NPCs) in a quest for gems to achieve Divine Enlightenment at the finish line by using multiple gadgets and tricks.

name: Mad King's Lair: Tome of Destruction
description: A Time Traveling, Story-Driven, Fully Voiced, Action RPG in the style of the Legend of Zelda Majora's Mask and Dark Cloud. This tool filled, NPC Driven Exploration and Puzzle game will keep you unlocking secrets for 80+ hours of whimsical, family friendly adventure!

name: Dirty Aim Trainer VR
description: Dirty Aim Trainer is designed to make transitioning from no VR FPS mechanics to a more experienced VR player. Review your stats, custom playlist fit to your weaknesses, up to 25+ levels & 15+ playlist, and a leaderboard with the top players and inclusive settings to make training fit your style.

name: Inside
description: Inside immerses you in a mysterious forest where shadows and whispers toy with your psyche. As you delve deeper, the line between reality and illusion blurs, with only a flashlight guiding your path in this psychological horror journey.

name: Air Attack 2
description: Take a 5 minute break to de-stress with this high-intensity, ultra simple, retro arcade shooter! Take down airplanes. Dig tunnels. Hide and seek shelter. Try and beat the highscore. That's all. Afterwards, you will go back to your life with renewed energy of body and mind.

name: Nakwon: Last Paradise
description:
Nakwon is a 3-person view Zombie Apocalypse Stealth Survival game.
Experience a new form of 'Post-Apocalypse Life' that you've never seen before.
Explore 'Extraction Survival' and gather resources from the PvPvE City, a place where Zombies and Survivors coexist to survive in this new societal structure.

name: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart
description: Magical Warrior Diamond Heart is an in-progress otome visual novel created by Dreamy Pyon. This game is inspired by magical girl anime. Play as Valerie Amaranth and decide the fate of the world, eat delicious donuts, and even smooch lots of cuties! Will Val defeat the Nightmares, make new friends, and perhaps find the love of her life along the way? Or will she meet her tragic end? Your choices decide her fate and the fate of humanity in this magical visual novel! The game features a diverse cast of characters from varying racial/ethnic backgrounds and LGBT+ dating options.

name: Pinball Champ '95
description: Pinball gambling game.

name: Simple DS Series vol. 39: The Shouboutai
description: Firefighting Simple DS Series game.

name: Rayer Shoot
description: Vertical scrolling shooter.

name: Maze of Flott
description: Strange car maze arcade game.

name: Blank Blood
description: Exploratory platform game of ryona style.

name: Sega Master System Brawl
description: SEGA Master System Brawl is a Genesis/Megadrive homebrew which pits more than 14 classic SEGA Master System characters against each other.

name: Lei Nu Ji Shen
description: Unlicensed Chinese GBC game.

name: Leucistic Wyvern
description: Space Harrier-like scrolling shooting game for Xbox 360.

name: Katapila
description: Net Yaroze game by Ben James.

name: Winged Gear
description: Arena shooting game.

name: Disc Station Vol. 17
description: Disc Station compile game.

name: Sam the Boulderman
description: James Hobden Net Yaroze game.

name: Robot Ron
description: Matt Verran's Net Yaroze game.

name: Time Slip
description: Snail time travel game by David Johnston & Mike Goatly for Net Yaroze.

name: Psychon
description: Net Yaroze top-down shooter.

name: Bouncer 2
description: A Scott Evans Net Yaroze game.

name: Decaying Orbit
description: Net Yaroze game made by Scott Cartier & David Dewitt.

name: Gas Girl
description: Koji Yoshikawa authored Net Yaroze game.

name: Invs
description: Philippe-Andre Lorin's single screen shooting game made with Net Yaroze.

name: Billiard
description: A comical billiard Russian game.

name: Drift Survivor
description: Paying Tribute to Classic Arcade Shooting Games. Drift Survivor is an addictive and fast-paced arcade shooting game that combines "drifting" with a "bullet hell" gameplay style!

name: Echos in the Dark
description: Navigate Sarah's mysterious home, solve puzzles, and confront lurking fears. Each playthrough unravels a story shrouded in mystery. Delve into the darkness. How far will you go?

name: Core Defence
description: Core Defence is a tower defence game with roguelike elements. Build towers to defend the Core, unlock new ones and upgrade them, choose from a variety of powerful effects and defeat bosses.

name: Battlegrounds: At Enemy Gates
description: BattleGrounds : At enemy gates is a quick to learn tag of war strategy game. Deploy tanks & planes in this strategy-focused war game. Receive donations from your allies worldwide to aid your battles. Combine the best war vehicles and come up with the best battle formations to overwhelm your enemies.

name: Molar: Underground
description: Dig in for handheld-inspired retro adventure as you become Molar with Mole a tenacious new character brought to life in this side-scrolling, 2-D, monochromatic indie game. Each new level presents growing challenges and memorable bosses you're sure to enjoy.

name: Greeded
description: Greeded is a stylish physical survival-puzzle game about long-handy robot in zero gravity. Swap tools, craft resources and explore an abandoned space station.

name: GunRun
description: Kill lots of things. Like. A LOT.

name: Shunya
description: "Drawing, Solve, Adventure"Girl and Cat embark on a CUBE MAGICAL journey.

name: Space Blade
description: Single player, top down, retro space-shooter, destroy enemies and fight bullet-hell bosses, upgrade during runs and after them to progress further and faster.

name: SCP: Event XK
description: Set in the universe of the SCP foundation, play as Doctor Logan Andersen as you fight to survive a catastrophic containment breach releasing dangerous entities and objects beyond scientific explanation.

name: Rowdy Rascals
description: "Rowdy Rascals" is the wackiest party game for all ages! Play mini-games with unique challenges, spin the Modifier Wheel for surprises, and gear up for a survival boss battle if there's a tie. Get set for non-stop fun and laughter with your friends!

name: 'Sassin
description: VR assassination blends with effortless freerunning & parkour in a world just starting to pull itself back together. You'll be able to run, climb, jump, and stab around carefully crafted maps with a variety of game modes, complete solo & multiplayer missions, battle enemy players, and so much more!

name: Pajithko
description: An action puzzle game that is unique and familiar with incredible fine art and the greatest classical music in our world's history.

name: Pro Shooter VR
description: Pro Shooter VR is the world’s first Olympic-style shooting sports game in VR. Challenge yourself in a shooting simulation like never before!

name: Realms of Age
description: Realms of Age is an online trading card game, which pits you against other players online to battle in the arena.

name: Three Blades Ranch
description: Three Blades Ranch is a ranching management simulator set in the wild west with a high fantasy twist. After a dragon destroys your ranch it's up to you to rebuild, resettle, and reclaim your homestead from the beast's fiery claws.

name: Tether Brawl
description: An action-packed, top-down, 2-player game set in a sci-fi world with a hint of cuteness, players are connected by a tether and must fight against waves of killer robots. Will you work with your partner to survive or betray them for a higher score?

name: Tempomancy
description: Overcome any obstacle in the surreal adventure of the Tempomancer and discover the secrets that the forbidden lands of Fissra hide, always with Time on your side.

name: Thalassophobia
description: Thalassophobia is a 4 player online co-op diving horror game. You and your team are tasked to dive and retrieve valuable objects from sunken vessels. Use your diving and scavenging equipment to clear out anything that tries to stop you from completing your mission.

name: Keikaku
description: Keikaku aims to bring its player to 90s japan with truly hardcore carbuilding mechanics and various lifesim elements.

name: Pokémon Academy Life
description:
Pokémon Academy Life is a visual novel that takes you into an alternate Pokémon world that doesn't send 10-year-olds off to fend for themselves. Familiar characters from the core series games are placed in an academy setting, where you take on the role of a student.

The majority of your time will be spent in the Kobukan (koh-BU-kahn) region, located fairly equidistant from the six regions. As Red (or custom player name), you are the dynamic protagonist who will interact with a plethora of characters. The story will progress in different branches depending on who you choose to talk to, who you try to befriend, pursue as a romantic interest, who you choose to help, and much more throughout your three years at the academy.

name: Water Sort: Perfect Pouring
description: Try to sort the colored water in the glasses until all colors in the same glass. The number of tubes and watercolors increases at every level of the game. Apply your gaming skills to arrange the same colors in one glass and the game.

name: Quest to Aztlan
description:
Lead your heroes to the lost city of Aztlan in this RPG and strategy game.
Quest to Aztlan is a RPG, adventure and strategy game in which you'll lead your heroes to the lost city of Aztlan. Face powerful creatures who protect this city in incredible real time RPG battles.
Are you prepared to discover the secrets of Aztlan and lead your heroes to victory?

name: Smart Way
description:
Smart Way is a highly addictive strategic turn-based puzzle game. A variety of levels which pick your brain and offer more fun as the game progresses.
The goal of the game is to outmaneuver and outsmart the super-clever characters that are trying to escape the game board by placing obstacles around them. Easy, you'd think, but the characters are clever and your task gets harder as the more demanding levels host different bonuses, just waiting to be picked up by the escaping characters.
Collect an average of 2 artifacts per level to unlock the next world.
Carefully designed and developed AI resulted in a highly intelligent and sneaky opponent creation which introduced a definite innovation in the board games community.

name: Surfy
description:
Surfs up! Land amazing tricks, collect power-ups and avoid a wipe out in this addictive, turbo charged surfing side-scroller.
Drop in from your helicopter and surf the greatest wave in the universe. Look out for rocks and whales, navigate tropical thunderstorms and launch into space to earn points and unlock wicked new boards. Challenge friends to a surf-off and watch the leaderboards to see who’s boss.

name: Tap a Gap
description:
Remove the rings by closing them. Gather the next highscore and share it with the world. A ring is build of bricks and sometimes bricks are missing. Incomplete rings are subject of your interest. Look at the rings! A complete ring adds points to your score. Be fast as the rings start to grow and the hole count increases. Unlock items freezing the playfield or shoot laser at all the bricks. Take your point count to be on fire and new highscore with us!
Developers Highscore is about 20.000 ... just updated right now: 30380
Highscore of a 9 Month old baby is 3142
Start tapping the gaps now.

name: Dungeoneers Academy
description:
Updated for faster, real-time play. Improved frame rate results in much faster and smoother movement in line with faster rogues and runners. A new real-time combat system allows better control and tuning, but you can still let go of all game controls to pause the action.
Dungeons are redesigned for quicker rogue-like play with a much stronger boss, and his cronies, waiting at the very end. Dungeon layouts, monsters and treasure are all randomized for replayability, and dungeons fill with more monsters as you level up.
You have tons of options. Choose Fighter, Ranger or Wizard. Each requires a different strategy. Also pick Human, Elf, Dwarf or Halfling, as well as gender. Then the Academy Store is always available with a huge selection of armor, weapons and spells to customize your unique hero.
Treasure and experience have been tuned for faster leveling and more equipment purchases to try things out. The Academy has also been shortened to get you into the real world faster.
Missions have also been revamped, but you still have the hero quest to become Hero of the Land. You can use missions to gain coins needed for a purchase, or experience required for the next level. You will also find missions with special equipment rewards.
Now create your hero candidate, graduate with honors, and venture out to beat back the invading horde and their ferocious masters.

name: Plany Plane
description:
Just paint your way and feel new gaming experiences.

Hop up into the plane and surge up into the sky, unforgettable adventures are waiting for you! Fly across unknown worlds, collect coins and display your ace techniques to earn more rewards. But do not lose your cautiousness! Countless obstacles will be laying on your way to success. Only the true ace can overcome them all, soar above green fields, break through snowing blizzard and between the streams of searing lava, leaving no scratches on the plane.

name: Platie
description:
The first multi-perspective game!
Tap in each camera view to jump forward. Or backward?
Try to figure out where you should go next while getting an awesome high score!

name: PopStealth
description:
Introducing a stealth action game that anyone can easily play and enjoy! !
Control a pop and cute stealth character and aim for the goal without being detected by the enemy!

name: Puzzle Colony
description:
Welcome, mighty adventurer!
Can you defeat the armies of the undead and drive them away from the royal islands?
Set sail for a great pirate adventure, improve your crew and recruit powerful allies to liberate villages and settlements. Get powerful weapons and artifacts from pirate treasures and become the greatest buccaneer of the kingdom. Only if you earn the Queen's goodwill, a glorious future awaits you.

name: Inch By Inch
description: A Puzzle About Inchworm's Adventure!

name: Batora: Lost Haven - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Batora: Lost Haven - Digital Deluxe Edition Includes:

Batora: Lost Haven - Full Game
Batora: Lost Haven - Original Soundtrack
Batora: Lost Haven - Digital Artbook

name: My Pet Hooligan: Clownin Around Pack
description: We're just here to clown around. Everyone's a bozo at heart.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Anime Girl Pack
description: Get senpai to finally notice you. Head to the streets as a school girl and wreak havoc on your enemies.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Season 0 - Founder Pass
description: Plant your flag as one of the earliest players of My Pet Hooligan with exclusive early access cosmetics.

name: My Pet Hooligan: Ninja Pack
description: Make your hooligan a ninja... a loud awkward ninja with a flamethrower and grenade launcher... but still a ninja!

name: My Pet Hooligan: Undies Pack
description: Socks and Undies is where function means fashion. Feel the breeze on your skivvies. Make your enemies blush and allies cheer.

name: Borderlands 2: Ultimate Upgrade Pack 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Borderlands 2: Ultimate Upgrade Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Aimee's Cafe
description: Aimee's Cafe is a cozy point-and-click adventure game where you play as Aimee, a lazy café owner who suddenly has to solve the mystery of the missing sugar, all to save the Spring Wake Festival.

name: Sonic Outbound
description: Sonic Outbound is a Sonic fan-game set one year after Sonic Mania's bad ending where Robotnik had the Phantom Ruby and Chaos Emeralds in possession. After the final battle in the core of the Titanic Monarch, Robotnik was stuck in Little Planet and started collecting the Time Stones and preparing his greatest plan yet.

name: Sonic Overdrive
description: Sonic Overdrive is a Sonic fangame that is a personal take on Sonic 4 episodes 1 & 2.

name: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness
description: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness is a fangame about the battle between Sonic and his friends against Eggman's evil plot. With the help of seven chaos emeralds, Eggman decides to mess up time so that he can carry out his plan.

name: Sonic QWERTY
description: What if "Sonic CD" happened in alternative universe?

name: Sonic Requeset
description: Sonic Requeset is just your generic Sonic fan game.

name: Untitled Paper Mario Fangame
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux
description: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux is a fan-made remake of Sonic: Before the Sequel.

name: Sonic Battle Rush
description:
Based on the original on the Gameboy Advance, Sonic and the gang are back to duke it out with each other once more! Only this time as a 2D traditional fighter!

Fight as Sonic the Hedgehog and Shadow the Hedgehog in the Sage demo and learn the ins and outs of their expanded moveset!

Old mechanics from the original are making a return here as well!

name: Sonic & Blaze
description: Sonic & Blaze is a 2D fangame inspired by the Sonic Rush series and the 3D Boost games.

name: Option Monster
description: Short game bundled in a Disc Station compile.

name: Whipplu Special
description: Simplistic Sharp block-sorter game.

name: Served in Yong'an
description: Save the alcoholic, debt-ridden Mei by bringing both her restaurant and herself from ruin. Decorate your venue, craft cohesive menus, deal with unexpected situations at work, and connect with friends both old and new. Can you help her get back on her feet before the three-year deadline?

name: RoboWarrior Arena
description: Welcome to MechWarrior Arena, where you'll immerse yourself in a futuristic world dominated by colossal war machines. In this thrilling single-player robot combat simulator, you'll design and customize your very own robot, then pit it against formidable foes in the arena.

name: Mokete
description: Mokete is a turn-based roguelike game with cartoon graphics and an alien theme. You'll take control of a brave alien who uses abducted animals in thrilling battles on Earth to become the zone champion and face mythical beings.

name: Medieval Kingdom Wars: Prologue
description: Rewrite medieval history through bloody siege combat in a fusion of RTS and Grand Strategy genres. Rule, build, and serve your King as a minor lord in medieval Europe. Experience siege, field and naval combat with an unseen degree of brutality. Rogue-like progression, epic towns and battles await…

name: Mood
description: This world has always been hostile to you. Human society disgusts you. MOOD - it is a dark visual novel where the player has to meet a cute girl and take a little walk with her. Nothing bad can happen, right?

name: Robokid
description: You are the robot with mindset of a kid, but your robotic body allowing you to fight better than most humans. Your goal is to solve the mystery how aliens got into spaceship and, most importantly to discover "who You are for real?" A strange scientist will accompany you during the exploration

name: Medimon
description: "Medimon" is a health science-themed monster-taming RPG. Players capture, battle, and evolve creatures symbolizing health concepts, turning intricate biology into an interactive and captivating game experience. Dive in and make education an adventure!

name: Paranormal Investigators
description: Paranormal Investigators is a 4 player co-op horror. You and your team are the hosts of a local TV show and explore abandoned houses with paranormal activity. You must make a video report and survive until dawn.

name: City Story
description: City Story is a horror-suspense-declassification game. The story begins through the production of a paranormal program, where a newbie cameraman and a down-on-his-luck producer visit a series of paranormal legends happening in Japan for the program.

name: Sands of Skullcreek
description: Sands of Skullcreek is retro style FPS. Your travels have brought you to this town that has been overrun by a gang. You decide to swear in as a deputy and restore order to this once peaceful place.

name: Moonbunny
description: Meet the guy who had a one-way ticket to heaven yet decided to take the express train to hell.

name: Phrank's Photon Pharm
description: Phrank's Photon Pharm is a logic puzzle game set in the steampunk world of Underland. Explore the caverns of Underland, solve hundreds of puzzles, uncover who threatens Underland's denizens, Save the Pharm!

name: Bring Me Home
description: Cute game about little octopus Blubi. You need to help him to get in his shell till the time is over.

name: Filter
description: Filter merges fast-paced 2.5D action with advanced, yet accessible, movement mechanics. Offering online PvP through rollback netcode and a transparent MMR system, FILTER caters to casual and pro players alike. A rich single-player campaign and unlockable character customization.

name: Idles of Torment
description: In the darkest corners of a forgotten realm, a mysterious pet idol awaits your attention. This enigmatic creature is no ordinary companion; it thrives on torment and feeds on sacrifice. Your mission is to keep it satisfied, even as it grows increasingly sinister and powerful.

name: Project Adaloria
description: An open world, free roaming, medieval fantasy realm. Survive and expand your own settlements amidst warring factions, dangerous monsters, and diverse characters. Choose your path: thief, trader, farmer, assassin, or colony builder!

name: Dreadnought
description: Mow down the alien hordes, scout for resources and survive. Dreadnought is a mix of Action Tower Defense Survival and Shoot 'Em Up Bullet Hell where you control the ships turrets & defend against waves of enemies. Choose your weapons, upgrade your ship & brace yourself, the horde is coming.

name: Isometria
description: Explore a procedurally generated isometric world solo or with friends. Build a base, explore caves, dungeons, tombs, deserts, and forests. Fight monsters, defeat bosses, mine rare elements, craft armor, potions, and more!

name: A Butterfly
description:
A butterfly wants to cross all gates till the end of the world!
It is a beautiful, lonely, firm butterfly, die for trying! But it never gives up!
This is a one tap arcade game. Reflex is the key and time is more important.
Lots of beautiful butterflies can be unlocked.
Anime music and Movie graphics.

name: Gear Planet
description:
Only one mission: link all gears!
It looks like very simple. But at the beginning, you may feel it so hard...There's always excess gear.Don't give up.One hour later, you will find how clever you are!

name: Club Feral
description: From the 15-year-old BAFTA-winning developer of Operator 41, a little arcade rhythm game I made during lockdown. Defeat a series of increasingly aggressive animals in the Club, or relax and try to beat your highscore in Endless mode.

name: Last Flip
description:
One mission: collect more and more coins.It is a happy and exciting time.
"Last Flip" only needs one tap to control. It is easy to learn, but can you avoid all cars? Or just happy to collect coins and forget watching out... Beautiful sky with cute colors. More animals can be unlocked.

name: Obeebok
description:
Obeebok is a 3D action adventure game where you run, jump over traps and obstacles to rescue turtles from evil wizards. Run lush woodland and swamps. You must collect droplets of water to survive, avoid traps, obstacles, and enemies.
The game features 60 levels, each with its own unique challenges.
Use your skills and reflexes to make your way through the woodland and swamps, and be strategic in order to collect enough water to survive.
The game is set in a beautiful and dangerous forest. The trees are tall and the leaves are green, but there are also dangers lurking around every corner. You'll need to be careful not to step on traps or fall into obstacles. You'll also need to watch out for enemies like wizards and their helpers. You'll have to avoid wild animals such as scorpions and spiders.
Collect droplets of water to survive and stay healthy. Beware of traps and obstacles, including wood logs rolling down the path, giant rolling rocks, and falling rocks. Watch out for spiders, scorpions, and giant fish.
Save the turtles and defeat the evil wizards!

name: Gravity Tilt
description:
Gravity Tilt is a challenging puzzle game were the goal is to get the earth through a maze of barriers. This game takes full advantage of the iPads accelerometer. You move the earth by simply tilting the device in the direction you want earth to move.
Along the way you must avoid a variety of obstacles. Some worm-holes have gravity that pulls the earth in. Others have a repulsive force that pushes the earth away. Try to navigate through the maze of obstacles to reach the goal in the least amount of time.

name: The Passenger
description: Alone on a crippled spaceship with a distrustful AI. What are you willing to do to survive?

name: Roams.io
description: Roams is a foraging/survival game set in a colorful 2d environment. You start off as a mouse and aim to make your way up the food chain through eating berries to gain xp. Your objective is simply survival, do this by progressing up the food chain and avoiding predators.

name: Cappi: Starbound Saga
description:
Go forth, it is you who will save the universes... from annihilation.

Cappi: Starbound Saga is a 2D platformer with gameplay styles inspired by the Kirby and Sonic series. With Cappi, use powerful abilities and maintain speed to be able to save the galaxy in record time.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: The Forbidden Forest Challenge
description: Escape the Forbidden Forest

name: Super Mario Continuance
description: Super Mario Continuance follows Riba from RPG Maker horror game "(Mario) The Music Box" on a quest to bring the Mushroom Kingdom's beloved hero, Mario, back from the dead. To do this, Riba must help Len Alwenia Foska (the god of rebirth) destroy an enigmatic entity who is traveling through time and erasing Riba from existence.

name: Sonic Spectre
description: A 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made with Clickteam Fusion

name: Sonic Skywind
description: A Sonic game introducing fast paced combat with limited open world areas involving story progress scenarios and side missions.

name: Mobius Red Zone
description:
Mobius Red Zone is a Sonic fan game in the same universe as the animated web series Sonic the HEDHUG. The events of 'Big Space Race' set the mysterious Red Comet on a collision course with Mobius where Sonic and Co live. Later, the events of 'Dr.Eg.D.S.' may have reloaded the planet, but not the rest of the world, and the Comet is still slowly moving towards the Mobius, finally arriving many years later, in the time of The New Circle.
No one expected this to happen, but upon arrival, the Red Comet released the cursed energy that suddenly changed the world to its corrupted, horrible version of itself - the so-called Red Zone where even the small pretty flower in the background can turn into a devastating mechanical monster with saws and lasers, and cannons, and even more saws.
Now our heroes embark on their own adventures to reveal the truth about the Red Zone and, maybe. even stop it from spreading across the whole Mobius... yet it still exists.

name: Daris Venture
description: Daris Venture is a half-Saturn/Advance-style fan-made game that will tell you an alternate history of Mobius that ended not in the best way for the Robotnik Empire.

name: Chapter Zero: The Angel Island Saga
description: The world is a chaotic, terrifying place, rife with all manner of monsters, warlords and hostile architecture. Even for the mighty Pachacamac clan, just the act of survival is a day to day struggle, and everybody seems to know that they can't keep it up forever. In pursuit of a safe home, a lone shaman named Ichima happens apon the Special Stage - and with it, a means of realizing their dreams of safety and peace...

name: Calamari Capsize
description:
"Calamari Capsize" is an exhilarating underwater adventure crafted for the Brackeys Jam 2023, where creators explored the theme of "Diving Deeper" with innovation and excitement. In this captivating game, you take on the role of a young kraken, wielding the immense power of the deep sea as you embark on a thrilling mission. Your objective? To plunge ships into the inky abyss within a limited timeframe.

As the mighty kraken, you'll command the sea's elements with your tentacles, relentlessly dragging ships down into the jaws of your formidable aquatic companion. The challenge lies in your ability to harness your newfound abilities to their fullest extent. Each vessel you pull beneath the waves adds to your ever-growing tally, driving your score higher and higher.

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you navigate treacherous waters, overcome obstacles, and race against the clock to see how many ships you can submerge in the depths. "Calamari Capsize" combines stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and the intriguing allure of the deep ocean, making it a captivating and challenging adventure for players of all ages. Are you ready to embrace your inner kraken and master the art of ship-capsizing in this oceanic showdown? Dive in and find out!

name: The Super Shinobi
description: An unlicensed and unofficial port of Shinobi III: Return of the Ninja Master,

name: Rumic Harrier
description: A manga-themed hack for Space Harrier starring Rumiko Takahashi.

name: Harrier Desse
description: A nonsensical themed hack for Space Harrier.

name: Street Harrier
description: A Street Fighter themed hack for Space Harrier.

name: Alborada
description: An idle forest game with a rich nature sound library. Discover, collect and customize your forest, set your ideal atmosphere to focus on your tasks or just relax and meditate with the sounds of nature.

name: The Route
description: You go along a road as your speed keeps going faster and faster until you lose

name: Probationary Girlfriend
description: I was given a contract to become lovers with a classmate for one month. After signing it, she's suddenly all over me...!?

name: Monster 2
description: Although I had a good house, wealth, I had no girlfriend who could give me sexual comfort. But one night I felt very lucky when I found stray cat girls. After gaining their trust I had sexual pleasure with them. Grace and Lucy disliked it all at first but over time they both came closer to me.

name: Heroes of Eroticism: Opportunities of Love
description: Return to the world of Heroes of Eroticism in this final chapter. Finish Liam's last chapter, filled with love, lust and superpowers.

name: Elder's Grace: Unchained
description: Elder’s Grace, Unchained is a magical action RPG meets castle defense, building & raiding & battling game. Create customized treasure strongholds. Build teams to plunder others or battle until there’s only one.

name: Valthazar's Sanctum
description: Delve into the dark heart of Valthazar's Sanctum, an ever-shifting roguelite FPS. Confront sinister traps, and battle his creatures. Can you survive and retrieve the relic?

name: Communication Breakdown
description: Navigate a series of puzzles, working in unison to guarantee the safe return of the capsule to Earth. Rely solely on verbal communication as you overcome obstacles and strive for success in this high-stakes mission. Will you succeed?

name: Egypt Frontiers
description: In the game Egypt Frontiers, players explore ancient Egypt, constructing authentic pyramid and making strategic decisions. The game offers the opportunity to learn about real history or create their own vision of civilization in both strategy and first-person modes.

name: Masquaradious
description: Utilize the power of the masks and explore the ever-changing world of Masquradious, where the stories is your to shape. Can the mask bring you to the happy end ? or will it bring you to the abyss ?

name: The Vorlec
description: Enter an adventure where you will have to make your way to the great metropolis, where hundreds of obstacles will stand in your way, you will have to be very careful because any obstacle can kill you...

name: Bang Bang Simulations
description: Players play the role of an amnesia "exile", looking for their own past in the end of the world. Gradually awaken your ability in the battle, collect and upgrade all kinds of powerful weapons to defeat the enemy blocking the way!

name: Tian Wang Xiang Mo Zhuan
description: Unlicensed Chinese Beat-'em-up Famicom game.

name: Kolobok Piramida
description: Russian bootleg of Uwol: Quest for Money

name: Zero Piece
description: The great age of pirates have began, as a marine it is your duty to keep peace of the world. it`s not an easy adventure. Are you ready to face the challenges ahead to keep peace and stop pirates from roaming around freely? Become an Admiral and lead the marines to stop powerful pirates.

name: Dawn of the Wizards
description: Dawn of the Wizards is a grid based dungeon crawler RPG. The game that puts its focus on live melee combat. Fighting monsters in a dungeon, solving puzzles and exploring the world and events that led to the dawn of the wizards and the downfall of all who opposed them.

name: Spellslayer
description: Take on the role of a spellcasting slayer puzzle tactics roguelite. Use a combination of clever positioning, strategic thinking and pure casting power to vanquish your enemies and claim the ultimate power source!

name: Tangled Snakes
description: Sin descripción

name: Canyon Watch
description: Sin descripción

name: Ball Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: DoubleClutch 2: Basketball
description: Sin descripción

name: Heavy Machines & Construction
description: Sin descripción

name: Car Simulator: Car Games 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Village Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Slapstick Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: AFK Dungeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Wrestling Fighting Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ninja Hands
description: Sin descripción

name: Train and Rail Yard Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Talking Bruce the Panda
description: Bruce is your pet panda, that shows nunchakus, responds to your touch and swipe and repeats everything you say with a cute voice.

name: Pac-Laby 3D
description: Pac-Laby3D is a simple, fun and very addictive game: the goal is to find all pellets in a maze. The maze is a ramdom construction and composed of 1 to 3 floors. The maze grows at each level, some pellets give options.

name: Music Run: Hall of the Mountain King
description: Music Run is a rhythm based, fast-paced arcade game. The music in this game is a classic by Edvard Grieg - In the Hall of the Mountain King.(Credits to Kevin MacLeod)

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Uprush
description: Uprush is a platformer game originally developed for Mini Game Jam in 3 days.

name: Trinity Heart
description: Bounce, whip, and blast your way through three challenging action stages!!! Enjoy bright scenery and goofy characters!!!

name: Spekel Sparks
description: Take off through the groves of Blooming Genesis with the charming assistance of brother foxes' Spekel and Bekel, and their friends, who decide to take matters into their own hands to stop the unruly and vicious A.C.E. Corporation from fully diving the world into a biochemical warfare with their nuclear creations! Try out each character and see which playstyle best fits you? Team up with friends and infiltrate their bases together!

name: Spacewing War 2
description: The galaxy-wide known cult Shine Tomorrow has taken over the Power Generators in the Center of the Galaxy, and you must stop them! In Spacewing War 2, jump into battle with many new unlockable weapon types and face enemies and obstacles from every corner of the Milkdromeda Galaxy.

name: Sal.
description: Sal. is a 2D arcade platformer that adds a twist, you have three floors to explore, destroy the Artlings, collect the Noskey, and find the secrets!

name: Quest 2: The Ancient Temples
description: Taking place directly after the events of Quest - The Adventure for the 6 Stones in the year 2036, the Wooden Knight and his friends, Alex and Brian, discover that the six legendary stones have to be recharged due to not being used in a very long time. This takes them to a region of Light Island called the Solar Region, where they have to find six ancient temples that can bring back the power of the stones. Along the way, they meet new friends and new foes, as well as beings that were around during the time of the Hero of the Past.

name: O-Bot The Robot 2
description: Last year O-Bot has stopped an invasion on his planet and now everything was peaceful. Until some strange lavender gear in a pile of junk activated itself and shot out beams everywhere, causing every creature and living things to be revived and teleported to one planet named "Earth". So O-Bot decided to investigate and find every piece of lavender gear to stop this chaos.

name: Five Nights at Candy's 3
description:
"I've always liked it when it rains...
the rain makes the silence go away,
it feels comfy and relaxing.
I don't like the silence
the silence means they're hiding
if they're hiding, they're coming closer
and if they come closer
they'll hurt me, for what I did- didn't do...
for what I couldn't do"

name: Five Nights at Candy's 2
description:
Rebuilt. Enhanced. Upgraded.
We brought joy to many, but that was long ago.
Broken. Fractured. Damaged.
In the end, we ended up where we came from.

name: Five Nights at Candy's
description:
No company is without a rival.

Freddy Fazbear's New Pizzeria has closed for good. And so, another restaurant is going to take its place in the world of entertainment.

What could go wrong?

name: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out!
description: Mr. Shootem Breaks Out! is an arcade-inspired puzzle-platform-shooter about destroying levels and levels of bricks by using a ball and pure firepower! Brought to you by a group of friends across almost a decade, it's a game unlike anything you've played before!

name: Mario Kart 64: Mega Mushroom Blast
description: A challenging mod that implements RPG elements, level system and a lot of features

name: Key Hunters DX
description: Key Hunters DX is an re-imagined version of Sonic & Knuckles: Key Hunters!

name: Heroes Origins
description: Sin descripción

name: Turbo Leaper
description:
The multiverse is colliding!

Some dark force has awoken far away... Breaking apart the barriers between different universes has opened wild portals, leaking corrupting energy!

It is up to a rag-tag group to eventually put a stop to this.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
description: This is an action-adventure game set in the world of Harry Potter. Players can roam around Hogwarts and interact with various characters from the movie, such as Ron, Hermione, Dumbledore, and Hagrid. The game allows players to engage in duels by casting spells against other students, familiar foes, and Death Eaters. As players explore the magical halls of Hogwarts, they can discover and trade magical objects, as well as unlock secrets and mysteries within the castle.

name: Harry Potter DVD Game: Wizarding World
description: A sequel to Hogwarts Challenge based on the fourth, fifth, and sixth Harry Potter movies. The featured mini-games are based on elements of the Harry Potter universe, such as casting spells, making potions, and using the Marauder's Map. The game is narrated by Jim Dale, narrator of the US version of the Harry Potter audiobooks.

name: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
description: The game follows the movie's plot, following Harry Potter as he tries to enlist Hogwarts students to his new secret society, Dumbledore's Army, in order to teach students Defence Against the Dark Arts. Being a mobile game, the story is mostly via dialogues and the occasional cutscene; each of the game's levels is preceded by a text-only introduction that sums up previous events. The players control Harry as he tries to sneak through the Hogwarts corridors, unseen by fellow students; from time to time, the stealth sequences are interrupted by duels (twitch action mini-games) and simple puzzles.

name: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets: Spellcaster Knowledge
description:
A minigame included in the widescreen DVD release of Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets.

Spellcaster Knowledge: Triggered by selecting the wand on the study's desk. This is a quiz based on spells cast by various characters in the film, the scene plays up to the point where the spell is cast and the player has to choose what happened as a result from three possible answers. If an incorrect answer is given the game moves to the next

name: Possess Quest
description: Possess Quest is a puzzle platformer where you play as the enemies.

name: Pibby: Apocalypse
description: Pibby: Apocalypse is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is centered around Learning With Pibby: Apocalypse,

name: Angelic: Dark Symphony
description:
Angelic is a narrative strategy-RPG set in a dark and collaborative sci-fi universe.

Dark Symphony is the upcoming single-player campaign of Angelic.

name: CubeGate
description:
CubeGate is a 3D puzzle game where you have to escape test chambers full of dangers and hassles.
Solve them by shooting portals, moving cubes, pressing buttons and more, but be careful: One step in the wrong direction and you will fall to your death or get hit by a turret.

name: Mars4
description: The first Real-Life Mars simulator.

name: Street Pursuit
description: Endless Runner PC Game

name: Tornado
description: Fly the Tornado multi-role combat aircraft in this classic simulator. Master simulator missions and graduate to multi-aircraft multi-mission campaigns involving a vast array of aircraft and ground vehicles. Includes the Tornado: Operation Desert Storm expansion.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Momoko no Kasei Bowling - La Mars Cup
